Policies.Title: Cancellation policies
Policies.Error: An error occurred while trying to retrieve the cancellation policies

maxAdvanceTime.Title: üìÖ Maximum advance booking time
maxAdvanceTime.Text: Users may book their sessions with a maximum advance of {{total}} days. Bookings that exceed this limit will NOT be accepted to ensure proper planning and class availability.

maxCancellationPerMonth.Title: üõë Monthly cancellation limit
maxCancellationPerMonth.Text: Users may cancel up to {{total}} classes per month. Once this limit is exceeded, any additional cancellation will be considered NOT recoverable.

cancellationRepeat.Title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Repeated cancellations
cancellationRepeat.Text: The same booking cannot be cancelled more than once. If a cancellation is attempted again, it will be considered late and there will be NO recovery option.

minHoursBeforeCancellation.Title: ‚è≥ Cancellation deadline
minHoursBeforeCancellation.Text: Users may cancel a booking up to {{total}} hours before the class starts. If the cancellation is made after this deadline, it will be considered late and NO recovery conditions will apply.

maxRecoveryDays.Title: üîÑ Class recovery
maxRecoveryDays.Text: A class canceled within the established period may be rescheduled or recovered within a maximum period of {{total}} days from the day of the canceled class. If it is not used within this period, it will be considered forfeited and there will be NO option for later recovery.

specific.Title: üìå Specific cases
specific.Text: For special or exceptional situations, it is recommended to contact the instructor directly to evaluate possible solutions or recovery alternatives.
